answers.answer: Hello and hope you are good.The exact cause of your symptoms can be determined after a complete medical evaluation. A detailed history, clinical examination and work up is necessary.Hyperthyroidism,worm infestation, peptic ulcer, diabetes mellitus all can lead to increased craving for food and unintentional weight loss. Excessive thirst, excessive sweating, increased appetite, increased frequency of urination are few of the common symptoms of diabetes mellitus. If in doubt consult a physician and get fasting blood sugar done. Do keep me posted.Best luck and regards!
